column3: We have patients here who can't feed themselves, so I have to keep that in mind when I'm making the meals. It's not easy work, but it does have its rewards.
Why are you looking at me like that? There's nothing wrong with the food, I swear!
Ahaha...hahaha... Tesleen, taken? Wicked Light, surely you jest? Hahaha...
Tesleen may be gone, but her share of the work still needs to be done. I'm sure she wouldn't want us to let standards slip.
I wish that Tesleen were here to see the stars in all their glory...
Though the world may be going through all sorts of upheaval, I still have a job to do.
I don't wish to sound ungrateful, but the dark of night does make it rather hard to see what I'm doing. I've burned the stew on more than one occasion.
